ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] New quest in Firiona Vie
ygData.msgSnippet: Yah.  I m a bit of an arachnophobe in RL.  The spiders in the original never bothered me, something about them wasn t quite right.  The Driders in Firiona
ygData.messageBody:
Yah. I'm a bit of an arachnophobe in RL. The spiders in the original never
bothered me, something about them wasn't quite right. The Driders in
Firiona though really give me the icks. Whatever they missed the first time
thru, they found part of it when they remodeled the spiders in Kunark.

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: Cranfill, Wendy [mailto:Wendy_Cranfill@...]
Sent: Tuesday, May 16, 2000 10:07 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] New quest in Firiona Vie


I haven't seen one of those yet but I have to say that both the spiders and
the leeches really really really really gross me out.

Hally

-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
Sent: Tuesday, May 16, 2000 10:02 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] New quest in Firiona Vie

Burynai are really cool! One of my favorite mobs from
Kunark so far. They
look like bipedal badgers, complete with the enormous claws!

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: Bill Costlow [mailto:atlatyl@...]
Sent: Tuesday, May 16, 2000 9:54 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] New quest in Firiona Vie



--- Kyle Sibbald <ksibbald@...> wrote:
> This is all what I figured about the quest when i
> first heard about it. So
> far as I gathered, there is no recipe. We apparently
> have to find one or
> rather forage one where burynai live.

OK, what is a burynai?
